sentences.english: Rib meat sheep will be washed, cut into 4 cm square block.
sentences.chinese: 將羊肋條肉洗淨，切成4釐米見方的塊。

sentences.english: Bullets hit people , there is a machine gun into the thick meat flu.
sentences.chinese: 子彈打在人身上，有一種槍槍入肉的厚重感。

sentences.english: The Crow set up a loud caw and dropped the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 烏鴉張嘴大叫了一聲，把肉掉了。

sentences.english: Seasoning the raw poultry for bourbon mustard chicken will lock in flavor within the meat.
sentences.chinese: 波旁芥末調味的雞生禽將鎖定在肉的味道。

sentences.english: What kind of meat are you most popular in your country?
sentences.chinese: 在你們國家人們最常喫哪幾種肉？

sentences.english: There may even be some wire or nylon biting into the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可能有一些金屬絲或者尼龍線勒到肉裏。

sentences.english: Sophie:Now wash them, then dice the potatoes and bell peppers. Then slice the meat.
sentences.chinese: 現在把他們都洗乾淨，青椒和土豆切成丁兒，肉切片。

sentences.english: One of the more sinister-sounding behaviours of China's angry youth online is the 'human flesh search engine'.
sentences.chinese: “人肉搜索”是中國憤青們比較惡毒的手段之一。

sentences.english: This is to allow the juices to seep back into the meat and make it that bit more succulent.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了讓肉汁滲回肉裏，讓肉喫起來多汁。

sentences.english: This is to allow the juices to seep back into the meat and make it that bit more succulent.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了讓肉汁滲回肉裏，讓肉喫起來多汁。

sentences.english: The meat will scorch if you don't lower the gas.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不把煤氣調小一點，肉就要焦了。

sentences.english: But you said it yourself, who wants to meet meat?
sentences.chinese: 不過就像你說的，誰希望與肉會面呢？

sentences.english: When he saw when the petals fell like a piece of them out of meat.
sentences.chinese: 當他看到花瓣掉了的時候，像是自己身上掉了塊肉。

sentences.english: If we had another name for this meat, people wouldn't even think twice.
sentences.chinese: 你若問起這種肉的別名，人們想都不想就會脫口而出。

sentences.english: He discovered, by some accident, that flesh roasted in front of afire tasted better.
sentences.chinese: 他意外地發現，在火前烤過的肉嚐起來更好。

sentences.english: You'll need a sharp knife and a wooden board for hashing up that meat.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一把利刀和一塊菜板來切碎那塊肉。
